mapper.select: SELECT i.id, i.invoice_number, i.project_id, p.job_code, p.customer_company_id AS customer_id, c.name AS customer_name, i.issue_date, i.due_date, i.status, i.total_amount, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(pay.amount) FROM payments pay WHERE pay.invoice_id = i.id), 0) AS total_paid, (i.total_amount - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(pay.amount) FROM payments pay WHERE pay.invoice_id = i.id), 0)) AS remaining_balance, CASE WHEN i.due_date < CURRENT_DATE THEN CURRENT_DATE - i.due_date ELSE 0 END AS days_overdue, CASE WHEN i.due_date >= CURRENT_DATE THEN 'Current' WHEN CURRENT_DATE - i.due_date <= 30 THEN '30 Days' WHEN CURRENT_DATE - i.due_date <= 60 THEN '60 Days' ELSE '90+ Days' END AS aging_bucket FROM tax_invoices i INNER JOIN projects p ON i.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN companies c ON p.customer_company_id = c.id WHERE i.status IN ('ISSUED', 'PARTIALLY_PAID', 'OVERDUE') AND (i.total_amount - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(pay.amount) FROM payments pay WHERE pay.invoice_id = i.id), 0)) > 0 ORDER BY i.due_date ASC, i.invoice_number ASC
